tweet.tweet_content: Just heard that Carl Fearns has pulled out a special.
Sushi for obvious health reasons but if my Samoan instincts took over all day “: Sushi or KFC?”
Obviously totally gutted at being left out for deciding Test but all efforts go into preparing the boys to see it through.
Major test of concept coming - win & they're B/Irish & credible. Lose & they're Welsh & haven't won since 1997. Brutal
